verses.verse: Ask <S%H7592><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> from the Lord <S%H3068><s%> at the time <S%H6256><s%> of the spring <S%H4456><s%> rain <S%H4456><s%> â€“ The Lord <S%H3068><s%> who makes <S%H6213><s%> the storm <S%H2385><s%> clouds; <S%H2385><s%> And He will give <S%H5414><s%> them showers <S%H1653><s%> of rain, <S%H1653><s%> vegetation <S%H6212><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%> to [each] man. <S%H376><s%>

For the teraphim <S%H8655><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> iniquity, <S%H205><s%> And the diviners <S%H7080><s%> see <S%H2372><s%> lying <S%H8267><s%> visions, <S%H8267><s%> And tell <S%H1696><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> dreams; <S%H2472><s%> They comfort <S%H5162><s%> in vain. <S%H7723><s%> Therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> [the people] wander <S%H5265><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> sheep, <S%H6629><s%> They are afflicted, <S%H6031><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> shepherd. <S%H7462><s%>

"My anger <S%H639><s%> is kindled <S%H2734><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> the shepherds, <S%H7462><s%> And I will punish <S%H6485><s%> the male <S%H6260><s%> goats; <S%H6260><s%> For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> has visited <S%H6485><s%> His flock, <S%H5739><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> And will make <S%H7760><s%> them like His majestic <S%H1935><s%> horse <S%H5483><s%> in battle. <S%H4421><s%>

"From them will come <S%H3318><s%> the cornerstone, <S%H6438><s%> From them the tent <S%H3489><s%> peg, <S%H3489><s%> From them the bow <S%H7198><s%> of battle, <S%H4421><s%> From them every <S%H3605><s%> ruler, <S%H5065><s%> [all] of them together. <S%H9191><s%>

"And they will be as mighty <S%H1368><s%> men, <S%H1368><s%> Treading <S%H947><s%> down <S%H947><s%> [the enemy] in the mire <S%H2916><s%> of the streets <S%H2351><s%> in battle; <S%H4421><s%> And they will fight, <S%H3898><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> [will be] with them; And the riders <S%H7392><s%> on horses <S%H5483><s%> will be put <S%H954><s%> to shame. <S%H954><s%>

"And I shall strengthen <S%H1396><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> And I shall save <S%H3467><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> And I shall bring <S%H7725><s%> them back, <S%H7725><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> I have <S%H7355><s%> had <S%H7355><s%> compassion <S%H7355><s%> on them; And they will be as though <S%H9201><s%> I had not rejected <S%H2186><s%> them, For I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%> their God, <S%H430><s%> and I will answer <S%H6030><s%> them.

"And Ephraim <S%H669><s%> will be like a mighty <S%H1368><s%> man, <S%H1368><s%> And their heart <S%H3820><s%> will be glad <S%H8055><s%> as if <S%H3644><s%> [from] wine; <S%H3196><s%> Indeed, their children <S%H1121><s%> will see <S%H7200><s%> [it] and be glad, <S%H8055><s%> Their heart <S%H3820><s%> will rejoice <S%H1523><s%> in the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
"I will whistle <S%H8319><s%> for them to gather <S%H6908><s%> them together, For I have redeemed <S%H6299><s%> them; And they will be as numerous <S%H7235><s%> as they were before.

"When I scatter <S%H2232><s%> them among the peoples, <S%H5971><s%> They will remember <S%H2142><s%> Me in far <S%H4801><s%> countries, <S%H4801><s%> And they with their children <S%H1121><s%> will live <S%H2421><s%> and come <S%H7725><s%> back. <S%H7725><s%>

"I will bring <S%H7725><s%> them back <S%H7725><s%> from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> And gather <S%H6908><s%> them from Assyria; <S%H804><s%> And I will bring <S%H935><s%> them into the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> and Lebanon, <S%H3844><s%> Until no <S%H3808><s%> [room] can be found <S%H4672><s%> for them.

"And He will pass <S%H5674><s%> through the sea <S%H3220><s%> [of] distress, <S%H6869><s%> And strike <S%H5221><s%> the waves <S%H1530><s%> in the sea, <S%H3220><s%> So that all <S%H3605><s%> the depths <S%H4688><s%> of the Nile <S%H2975><s%> will dry <S%H3001><s%> up; And the pride <S%H1347><s%> of Assyria <S%H804><s%> will be brought <S%H3381><s%> down, <S%H3381><s%> And the scepter <S%H7626><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> will depart. <S%H5493><s%>
"And I shall strengthen <S%H1396><s%> them in the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And in His name <S%H8034><s%> they will walk, <S%H1980><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
